name: ASCPEM-PRF-8 - Control Elements Requiring Significant Resource Element within Control Flow Loop Block
description:
Objective
Detection of occurrences of this pattern helps decrease software resource waste by preventing the repeated consumption of resource due to resource consuming operations found directly or indirectly within loops.

Consequence
Software that is coded so as to execute expensive computations repeatedly (such as in loops) requires excessive computational resources when the usage and data volume grow

qualityRules.name: Quality Rules in numeric ID order
